metadata.title: CVE-2017-9168 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: libautotrace.a in AutoTrace 0.31.1 has a heap-based buffer overflow in theReadImage function in input-bmp.c:353:25.

criterions.comment: autotrace: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was deferred').
